mapper.select: select * from entrycomment WHERE entry_no=#{entry_no} ORDER BY reg_date DESC LIMIT #{start_index}, 10
mapper.insert: insert into entrycomment(user_no, entry_no, loudsourcing_no, reg_date, content, commenter_name, profile_img, comment_private) VALUES (#{user_no}, #{entry_no}, #{loudsourcing_no}, #{reg_date}, #{content}, #{commenter_name}, #{profile_img}, #{comment_private})
mapper.update: update entrycomment SET comment_private=#{comment_private}, commenter_name=#{commenter_name}, profile_img=#{profile_img} WHERE entry_comment_no=#{entry_comment_no}
